Understate: The claim understates the fact that two debate moderators did ask Donald Trump about how he planned to create more jobs.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the question about creating more jobs was asked in two of the three presidential debates.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it fails to provide evidence or examples to back up the assertion that no debate moderator ever asked Donald Trump about creating more jobs.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that no debate moderator asked about job creation, when in fact they did.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the question was asked but the person making the claim may have missed or forgotten it.
